fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48422].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
The TeamCal event reminder job runs every 5 minutes, and it queues items after it runs so that every reminder is sent up to 5 minutes later than it should.
For example, when a user sets the reminder for an event in team calendar to be sent 1 hour before the event start, the reminder is sent at 55 minutes before.

 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!
 !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Set up a mail server
# Create an event in team calendar
# Set the reminder to be 1 hour before the event start
# Confluence will send a reminder email with 5 minutes delayed

h3. Expected Results
Email is received at the time expected.

h3. Actual Results
Email is received up to a 5 minute delay.

h3. Notes
To check this, put DEBUG loggin on
* {{com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3}}
* {{com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3.notification}}

And create an Event at 14:42 for start at 14:50.

*Add event with reminder set for 5 mins before event starts*
{code}
2016-10-05 14:42:00,031 INFO [AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2] [extra.calendar3.notification.DefaultCalendarNotificationManager] doInTransaction do notification on thread :AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2
2016-10-05 14:42:00,042 DEBUG [AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2] [extra.calendar3.notification.DefaultCalendarNotificationManager] getMailableUsers Mailable user: jrichards
2016-10-05 14:42:00,042 DEBUG [AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2] [extra.calendar3.notification.DefaultCalendarNotificationManager] getMailableUsers Excluded mailable user: jrichards
{code}

*{{CalendarReminderJob}} runs on the next 5 minute boundary*
{code}
2016-10-05 14:45:00,007 INFO [scheduler_Worker-3] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] execute CalendarReminderJob is running
2016-10-05 14:45:00,008 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-4] [extra.calendar3.util.DefaultAsynchronousTaskExecutor] call Task com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob$RemindEventForUserCollector@28d4a6a7 spent 1ms in queue
{code}

*{{CalendarReminderJob}} runs on the next 5 minute boundary*
{code}
2016-10-05 14:50:00,006 INFO [scheduler_Worker-9] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] execute CalendarReminderJob is running
2016-10-05 14:50:00,007 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-0] [extra.calendar3.util.DefaultAsynchronousTaskExecutor] call Task com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob$RemindEventForUserCollector@46b76989 spent 0ms in queue
{code}

*{{CalendarReminderJob}} runs sending items it found*
{code}
2016-10-05 14:50:00,039 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-0] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] dumpLogDebug CalendarReminderJob is running with a list of reminder user : 1
2016-10-05 14:50:00,040 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-0] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] dumpLogDebug Will remind for user : ConfluenceUserImpl{name='jrichards', key=ff8080815792213e01579222dca40001}
2016-10-05 14:50:00,040 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-0] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] dumpLogDebug ##### For event com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3.model.ReminderEvent@56a26c42
2016-10-05 14:50:00,042 INFO [AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2] [extra.calendar3.notification.DefaultCalendarNotificationManager] doInTransaction do notification on thread :AtlassianEvent::CustomizableThreadFactory-2
2016-10-05 14:55:00,006 INFO [scheduler_Worker-8] [calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob] execute CalendarReminderJob is running
2016-10-05 14:55:00,006 DEBUG [team-calendars-worker-1] [extra.calendar3.util.DefaultAsynchronousTaskExecutor] call Task com.atlassian.confluence.extra.calendar3.reminder.job.CalendarReminderJob$RemindEventForUserCollector@5500363d spent 0ms in queue
{code}
fields.summary: CalendarReminderJob only runs every 5 minutes delaying sending of reminders
Cant move issues on Team Calendars

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48420].
  {panel}

Environment: 
* It just occurs on firefox in windows 7
* Verify on IE, chrome and firefox in Mac. It's work fine.

Steps
# Install teamcalendar 5.1.7-SNAPSHOT (master branch)
# Go to my team calendar screen
# Create a new calendar
# Add an event

Spinner is loading forever

!Screen Shot 2014-11-03 at 9.22.55 AM.png!
fields.summary: [My Team Calendar] Spinner is loading forever - firefox in windows 7
Release TC 5.2.7 to EAC
Timeline view has a strange way to show events

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48416].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Statement
As described, deleting a Confluence space removes *all space related calendars* as well as *all subscribed calendars from different spaces*.

h3. Steps To Reproduce
# Create two users: User A and User B.
# Login as User A.
# Create a brand new space (Space A) and add a *new calendar* within Space A (Calendar A). Add some events to the calendar or you may leave it blank.
# Login as User B.
# Create a brand new space (Space B) and add *existing calendar* (Calendar A) into Space B.
# Both Space A and Space B now contain Calendar A.
# User B removes Space B.

h3. Expected Behaviour
All Space B related calendars (not subscribed) should be removed and all subscribed calendars show be removed from *view only*.

h3. Actual Behaviour
*All space related calendars* as well as *all subscribed calendars from different spaces* were removed entirely from Confluence. Database no longer contains these calendars entries.

h3. Workaround
Remove all subscribed calendars from the space view prior to space deletion.
fields.summary: Deleting a Space Removes All Calendars Subscribed Within The Space

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48415].
  {panel}

When dragging a Jira Issue Event to another day or time of the same day. 
The time loses which time of the day it is.

The time is always stored as am

So 01:30 am stays 01.30 am
But 01.30 pm becomes 01.30am

In 24hours notation it behaves the same.
So 13.30 becomes 01.30 (am)
fields.summary: Rescheduling a Jira issue in the calendars misses the am/pm

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce
# Login to Confluence 5.5.3
# Assuming Team Calendar is installed, go to Confluence Dashboard
# Click My Calendars
# Add a calendar
# Add an event by filling the necessary details
# Click on the calendar event

Current result : Some words (edit and delete) is appearing in English instead of French
Expected result : All words should appear in French instead of English.

Attached below is the screenshot of the bug
fields.summary: some text in Team Calendar for French language is showing in English

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48411].
  {panel}

Steps
* created a calendar
* search this calendar on quick search
* click on the calendar on the search result

Actual
* It shows the calendar view page
* Some texts are not shown in Info message box

Expected
* The message should show full texts inside

Please have a look at the attached picture

!Screen Shot 2014-10-17 at 1.26.59 PM.png!
fields.summary: Some texts are not shown in Info message box
TC JIRA issues not updated after backend JIRA DB summary updates

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48407].
  {panel}

The calendar-resources {{<web-resource>}} has 4 resource references to files that no longer exist.

 * com/atlassian/confluence/extra/calendar3/js/event-edit/event-field-handlers.js
 * com/atlassian/confluence/extra/calendar3/js/event-edit/jira-event-field-handler.js
 * com/atlassian/confluence/extra/calendar3/js/event-edit/event-edit-dialog.js
 * com/atlassian/confluence/extra/calendar3/js/event-edit/event-types.js

It looks like these files were moved elsewhere as part of a AMD refactor (nice work btw, AMD is awesome!).

This results in log spam in Confluence instances at runtime that looks like this:

{code}
2014-11-13 17:34:49.339334500 2014-11-13 17:34:49,331 WARN [TP-Processor1] [atlassian.plugin.servlet.AbstractDownloadableResource] streamResource Resource not found: Resource: com.atlassian.confluence.extra.team-calendars com/atlassian/confluence/extra/calendar3/js/event-edit/event-types.js (null)
2014-11-13 17:34:49.339337500  -- referer: https://pug.jira-dev.com/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=BizTeams&title=Meet+Gaffer | url: /wiki/s/6a3425370dd348358ec5834057419d19-T/en_US/5726/e8df706f593d386d7dc2ab19ce1042ee443ccdf9.157/eb4ebd5f3c949f4e837e7dcbe8016740/_/download/contextbatch/js/editor,macro-browser,fullpage-editor,-viewcontent,-atl.general,-page,-plugin.quick.comment.pre,-main/batch.js | userName: alwang
{code}
fields.summary: calendar-resources includes non-existent resources

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48405].
  {panel}

*Steps to reproduce:*

#  Add a new calendar
# Add a few events for this calendar
# delete the new calendar
#  You will receive an email with the backup of the Calendar
!calendaremail.PNG|thumbnail!
# Download the ICS file and restore it confluence
# Check on calender for events

*Expected Result*
All of the events will be listed in there

*End result:*
None of the events was shown
fields.summary: Backup of the Calendar(ICS)does not contains any event
Adding Subscription Cal by URL stores user password unencrypted
Watching status does not show correctly on sub calendar panel

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48395].
  {panel}

I am not sure what attracted my attention to this, but I am seeing the accept answer link for any answer including my own. 

I am assuming the accept answer link means the answer would be marked as answered verses requesting answer acceptance. 

I am seeing this link on questions waiting for an accepted answer. Either the wording should be changed if this link is for requesting answer review or the ability should be taken away from non-employees. 

Even if you want to add the ability for high karma people to mark answers as correct, I should not be allowed to accept my own answer.
fields.summary: Why am I seeing the accept answer link as a non-employee?
Granular permissions for questions
User recent activity

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48389].
  {panel}

It would be better if we add another prerequisite to the Ban feature on Confluence Questions, other than just having enough Karma.

Example: The target user must also have negative karma.

*Why?*
Let's say a Confluence Questions user is having a really bad day and chooses to ban another user's account (which always helps on the forum) after some discussion on a thread...

Currently it is possible to happen, so I guess we should add another prerequisite to this feature.
fields.summary: Add another prerequisite to the Ban feature on Confluence Questions
Cannot convert or edit someone's comment
What happened to the instaban feature?
Personal Activity Feed
Ability to mark Questions as "favorites"
unanswered question tab has no 'show more' linke
canceling a comment is slow
Search for multiple topics in the big search bar
Can't edit my comment
Display topic statistics from topic page
Where is search?
Allow @mentions in questions and comments
User recent karma points earned by Q&A
Add ability to upvote comments
Questions 1.0.618 Source not available on https://my.atlassian.com
Ability to enable Watch All questions for All Users
Sections with different permissions
Allow points to be awarded when answering your own question.
I would like to embed videos in my CQ answers
Add rich editing to comments
Configurable e-mail subject line prefix
Should CQ have its own item on status.atlassian.com?
Clicking Feedback produces two boxes

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48340].
  {panel}

Guys...the tagging system is all but broken.  Go back to something you know works.  There are so many tags now in your test platform that when I try to type one in my browser locks up for about 5 minutes.

Yes, I can select one of the existing ones presented as suggestions...

But...it's horrible.  Definitely not ready for prime time.

By the way, I tried to type 1.0.655 for the version number, but it doesn't exist in your "effected versions" list.  Are you guys not following your own deployment methodologies?  Not good.
fields.summary: Tagging system is broken

fields.description:

EAC isn't down.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48329].
  {panel}

releng home uses cq include and that adds 22+ seconds to page load. See attachments.

Page home url: https://extranet.atlassian.com/display/RELENG/Home
Actual page which uses CQ include: https://extranet.atlassian.com/display/RELENG/2-+FAQs

(before I forgot)
https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/9704/applications/1678101/transactions?type=app#id=532388215
/topic (GET)
min 22 seconds, max 72 seconds - consistent with build eng FAQ page timings
fields.summary: CQ topic with high number of questions takes long time to load
CQ questions with minus values are considered popular
Open Confluence Questions in new window when clicking on the Question within the questions list macro.
Add ability to Disable Upvotes on Questions

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48320].
  {panel}

Every now and then, users complain that no email is going out of Confluence + Questions.  

Restarting it seems to clear the backlog and we don't seem to lose any emails, but I cannot for the life of me find out why it's happening.  The mail server reports no email incoming.  Confluence logging shows no errors around the email even in debug mode, it's like Confluence has simply decided not to even try to send the mail.  I don't know where to look in Confluence to debug this.

Are there any pointers as to where to look on this?

Actually, Atlassian Answers is in this state at the moment - no emails have arrived from it for days now.
fields.summary: Email stops, unable to work out why
stats display / wrapping

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48317].
  {panel}

Hi, 

I was pointing out this already someday in Answers that it would be great to have a "personalized" activity stream. The activity that only show changes to the questions where we contributed. (we added a comment/answer, our questions, .. )

This could be very helpful to catch up with updated after last log in and not forget about any important comment. 

Currently the only way is to check email to know if there was a reply to the question or answer.. 

Thanks,
fields.summary: Personalized activity stream
Need rich-text formatting in comments
Filter out "+1" comments
Vote for own question
The placement of this info box is weird
Have different "Confluence Admin" for CQ instead of using Confluences
Which to we work on now?
Either lost the ability to see the question in activity order or recent selection is broken

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48307].
  {panel}

Seems you can't create a new topic if the name exists in a label  on a page somewhere.

The UI doesn't really warn you until you click through to the end. 

Also, you can't add topic watchers since these topics are not shown in the Topics page.

The only way I've been able to make it show so far is to create at least one question using that topic.
fields.summary: can't create topic if same label exists
Unclear how I can get back to the list of questions from a question
Add Ability to Edit Comments

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48303].
  {panel}

Hi, 

When adding a comment there is no option to use formatted text.. We cannot easily add images, links or code.. 

Adding comments should also have the same editor like for adding answers. 

Event converting answer to a comment is not enough .. Link and image is working but other formatting is missing .. 

In addition not every user can convert answer to a question so this is not a good option.. 

Thanks,
fields.summary: Adding a comment is only allowing text...

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48300].
  {panel}

*How to Replicate The Bug*

# Generate a new test question
# Log out and log in using a different user
# Access the new test question generated by the previous user
# Up vote the question multiple times
# Access Mail Queue and click "Flush Mail Queue" button

*Result*

Confluence will generate multiple notification to the users watching the question with the same title, "<User> Upvoted your question".

*Improvement Behaviour*

Confluence should not generate multiple notification with the same title when the action to generate such notification happen in a close proximity of time.
fields.summary: Clicking Upvote Multiple Time on The Same Question/Comment Generating Multiple Notification
how to I search for questions and answers?
Doesnt offer an improvement from answers for logs, stacks, code
Delete unused Questions "topic"
Add ability to opt in to email notifications for every new question/answer
it's Ok
Submit Question button should be more accessible with many Topics
Introduce your teams to Confluence Questions
Wrong display name

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48281].
  {panel}

It took me awhile about 20 minutes to actually hit the submit button on an answer.   After hitting the submit button the answer displayed, but it showed the time of 21 minutes ago.  You should measure the time from the time of submit and not from the time when I start entering the answer.

To reproduce
1)  start answering a question
2) stop typing for 5 to 10 minutes.
3) finishing type your answer
4) submit

The time on your answer is 5 to 10 minutes old already.
fields.summary: The time shown for when I created an answer is incorrect.
An extra/unneeded space above the Question text.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48278].
  {panel}

We use confluence already for some years and therefore we have quite some FAQ spread across different space. I like the Confluence Question solution but I do have a challenge. Do we either move these FAQ to Confluence Questions or do we keep the FAQ and duplicate the questions into Confluence Questions and put a link to the original wiki page as answer. 

I still like the FAQ in a space because the FAQ is a part of something bigger. But I also like the power of Confluence Questions, the way the community can easily contribute. It would be great if a FAQ in a space could be made available in Confluence Questions without duplication of data. 

I see current different options but there might be others

* A data synchronization between page and answer. 
* Confluence Questions shows the content of wiki page automatically if a wiki link is posted as answer
fields.summary: Reuse confluence page content in a confluence answer without duplicating data

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48277].
  {panel}

I attempted to search for keywords "sql server".   I got the dropdown with about 10 answers.   I was not able scroll down to see the last few answers.  
When I moved the cursor to the scroll bar, the dropdown disappeared.

Then when I hit the enter key hoping to see the list of results it took me to the enter question dialog.

I know there are more questions marked with sql server than those ten questions.
fields.summary: How to search by keywords?
Clicking "Ban this user" Button doesn't change anything
Can't add images to Answers
Provide a notification and link to Answer Comments

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48267].
  {panel}

Your idea of a more fancy topic search was on the right track previously,  but it was not easy or very usable as well as confusing.   There was too much ui complexity in it.

The interface of searching through topics should be improved some more. 

There should be a way to search with multiple topics.   Some topics requires additional properties like product topics.  Topics and grouping or topics should be limiting topics.

So if I search by 

sql-server

 I see all questions with this label (like it does now)

If I search by

sql-server jira (which does not work)

I see all questions with these two labels and all questions with sq-server without any product labels.  I should be able to visually see this distinction as well.

if I search by 

configuration sql-server  jira

I would like to see all questions with all questions with
jira configuration sql-server
jira configuration
jira sql-server
configuration (with no product label)
sql-server (with no product label)

Again I should visually see this distinction on how you want to display the results.

I think showing the various grouping of the labels and allowing the user to select or click the groupings he want to look at might be an interesting approach.

Yes, this type of interface breaks down if you have too many topics(labels) but in reality a user will probably enter no more than 4 to 6 labels in the most common cases.  I would not restrict the number either since the interface would only be listing the proper set of combinations and not actually selecting the question themselves.

I like that you are autocompleting the list of topics for a single topic,  there should be a way to do this with multiple topics as well.  Otherwise I would like to see an ordered list of topics that I can browse through and select from.
fields.summary: improve searching by topics
Allow users to export/import the content of Questions plugin
My questions and answers
The answer window is narrow

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48261].
  {panel}

I've seen many cases like this and I believe it's a trend, we have a lot of questions that are unanswered in Answers backlog and potentially will never be answered.

I see that most of those questions aren't trivial, which makes me believe that people tend to answer the easy ones and let behind the tough questions. 

Now that we are building the new Answers portal with Confluence questions, I think that it would be a good idea create a system that automatically increase the Karma bounty for questions that are unanswered for a long time.

Of course there are some of those old questions that are not relevant, so we could take in consideration only the questions that have a significant number of watchers of page views for example.
fields.summary: Automatically increase bounty for question
Recently viewed Questions don't appear in the Recently Viewed list in the Insert Link dialog

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48235].
  {panel}

My question have more than 100 answers. And now they will be separated by applying the paging (4 answers per page => there're 25 pages).

It's very hard to find (walkthrough all 25 pages to find the best answer). Before applying the paging I often used Cmd+F to find the answer that work for me.

*Expected:*
* It should be better if there are a way that allow users search answer's content, somewhere near "120 answers"

!Screen Shot 2015-04-14 at 9.33.57 AM.png|thumbnail!
